code: export default function buildCalendar(value){var startDay=value.clone().startOf('month').startOf('week');var endDay=value.clone().endOf('month').endOf('week');var day=startDay.clone().subtract(1,'day');var calendar=[];while(day.isBefore(endDay,'day')){calendar.push(Array(7).fill(0).map(function(){return day.add(1,'day').clone();}));}return calendar;}
